name: simple-node-server
description: A typescript server that allows keyboard to execute code'.

scripts.dev: npm install && npm run build && node dist/src/server.js
scripts.dev:watch: npm install && concurrently "npm run build:watch" "nodemon dist/src/server.js"
scripts.kill: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No process found on port 3000'
scripts.kill-ws: lsof -ti:4002 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No process found on port 4002'
